title: Terminal Breach
description: Terminal Breach is a timed survival shooter where you get data experience to level-up and gain upgrades, demolish as much waves of enemies as you can and survive until the timer is complete to successfully breach the terminal. Experiment and play with different playstyles by combining breachers with other item upgrades, bullet modifiers and weapons to unleash countless bullets to your enemies. Fabledom Choose a breacher that is fit to your style. They vary stats from each other and have their own strengths and weaknesses, distinct feel and an active ability to aid you in your breach .

game_info.Genre: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access
